* Assign all entries without category to category "Uncategorized"
"UPDATE tipo_mov SET parentId=0 WHERE parentId is null and id not in (select parentId from tipo_mov where parentId is not null group by parentId) and id > 0"
"UPDATE tipo_mov set parentId=0 where id>0 and parentId is null"

* @param string $sql - The query to perform. It should produce a single column and a single row.
* @return mixed the result returned from the query
* @param string $sql - The query to perform. It should produce a single column and a single row.

SELECT count(*) as colCount FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA=DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME='
